title: Uber Stock Tumbled After London Granted It a License for Just Two Month
text:
Uber Technologies (ticker: UBER) shares plunged over 5% on Tuesday as the ride-sharing company lost its latest effort to secure a long-term operating license in London—one of the company’s most important markets. London’s main transportation regulator, Transport for London, granted Uber a two-month license on Tuesday instead. That’s among the shortest terms the agency has ever granted.
